Login & recovery.subtitle: Manage your passwords, login preferences and recovery methods.

Saved login info.subtitle: We'll remember the login info for you, so you won't need to enter it on your iCloud devices.

Security checks.subtitle: Review security issues by running checks across apps, devices and emails sent.

Account ownership and control.subtitle: Manage your data, modify your legacy contact, deactivate or delete your accounts and profiles.

Deactivation or deletion.subtitle: Temporarily deactivate or permanently delete your accounts and profiles.

Connect contacts.subtitle: We'll sync and securely store your contacts to help you connect with people you know on Instagram, recommend things you care about and offer you a better service. You can choose which contacts to follow. Disconnect anytime to stop syncing. Learn more

Accounts Center.subtitle: Password, security, personal details, ad preferences

Sleep mode.subtitle: Automatically mute notifications at night or whenever you need to focus.

Likes and comments on photos of you.subtitle: johnappleseed commented on a post you're tagged in.

Photos of you.subtitle: johnappleseed tagged you in a photo.

Comment likes and pins.subtitle: johnappleseed liked your comment: 'Nice shot!' and other similar notifications.

Comment daily digest.subtitle: johnappleseed recently commented on this post: Nice shot!

Posts suggested for you.subtitle: johnappleseed shared a post you might like.

First posts and stories.subtitle: See johnappleseed's first story on Instagram, and other similar notifications.

Notes.subtitle: johnappleseed, janeappleseed and 3 others shared notes.

Add to post submissions.subtitle: johnappleseed and 3 others want to add to your post. Review their submissions.

Added to post.subtitle: johnappleseed added your photo to their post.

Collaboration invites.subtitle: johnappleseed invited you to collaborate on a post.

Accepted follow requests.subtitle: John Appleseed (johnappleseed) accepted your follow request.

Account suggestions.subtitle: johnappleseed, who you might know, is on Instagram, and other similar notifications.

Mentions in bio.subtitle: johnappleseed mentioned you in their bio.

Message requests.subtitle: johnappleseed wants to send you a message.

Message reminders.subtitle: johnappleseed sent you a message (1d ago).

Group requests.subtitle: johnappleseed wants to add janeappleseed to your group.

Broadcast channel invites.subtitle: johnappleseed invited you to join their broadcast channel: Hellow World!

Original audio.subtitle: johnappleseed created a reel with your audio.

Recently uploaded reels.subtitle: johnappleseed, johndoe and janedoe recently shared new reels.

Reels suggested for you.subtitle: johnappleseed shared a reel you might like.

Add Yours.subtitle: johnappleseed started an Add Yours prompt.

Reels made for you.subtitle: See new reels made for you.

Reminders.subtitle: You have unseen notifications, and other similar notifications.

Support requests.subtitle: Your support request from July 10 was just updated.

Trending places.subtitle: John Appleseed Park is a trending place near you. See what's being shared.

Birthdays.subtitle: johnappleseed has a birthday today! We'll only notify you for people who choose to tell others about their birthdays on Instagram. You can change who to tell about your birthday any time in your profile Personal information settings.

Reminder emails.subtitle: Get notifications you may have missed.

Product emails.subtitle: Get tips and resources about Instagram's tools.

Support emails.subtitle: Get updates on reports and violations of our Community Standards.

Accounts you follow.subtitle: Get notified when accounts you follow add new products to their shops.

Suggested for you.subtitle: Get notified about products and shops you may like based on your activity on Instagram. If you've set up your Accounts Center with Facebook, it will also be based on your activity on Facebook.

Private account.subtitle: When your account is public, your profile and posts can be seen by anyone, on or off Instagram, even if they don't have an Instagram account. When your account is private, only the followers you approve can see what you share, including your photos or videos on hashtag and location pages, like your profile picture and username, is visible to everyone on and off Instagram. Learn more

Recommend reels on facebook.subtitle: Allow your reels to be shown with your Instagram username to anyone on Facebook. They won't be shared from your Facebook account, if you have one. Your reels will be Public, so anyone on or off Facebook can view or like your reel. Anyone on Facebook can create reels with your original audio and, if you allow it in your Reels settings on Instagram, remix your video. Learn more

Hide story and live from.subtitle: Hide your story and live videos from specific people.

Deliver requests to.subtitle: Message requests from people who follow you on Instagram will be delivered to your Message requests folder unless you choose not to receive them.

Delivers requests to.subtitle: Message requests from other accounts on Instagram will be delivered to your Message requests folder unless you choose not to receive them.

options: Only people you follow on Instagram
Allow story replies only from people you follow

Show activity status.subtitle: Allow accounts you follow and anyone you message to see when you were last active or are currently active on Instagram apps. When this is turned off, you won't be able to see the activity status of other accounts. Learn more You can continue to use our services if active status is off.

Read receipts.subtitle: Others can see when you've read their messages.

Show previews.subtitle: See previews of Instagram content like posts, stories and reels in your end-to-end encrypted chats. Learn more about previews.

Contacts' devices or keys change.subtitle: Show alerts when you or your contacts log in on a new device or change keys. Alert for contacts will appear in your chat with them. Learn more

options: Allow tags from people you follow
Who can tag you.subtitle: Choose who can tag you in their photos and reels. When people try to tag you, they'll see if you don't allow tags from everyone. Potential spam will always be filtered.

options: Allow mentions from people you follow
Who can @mention you.subtitle: Choose who can @mention you to link your account in their stories, notes, comments, live videos, and captions. When people try to @mention you, they'll see if you don't allow @mentions.

Allow people to boost stories they menti.subtitle: Coosting turns content into an ad so it can reach more people. Stories you're mentioned in, including ones that share your post and reels, can only be boosted if you have a public account that allows mentions. These stories may also be visible for longer than 24 hours and can be seen by anyone.

Allow people to boost stories that resha.subtitle: Stories that reshare your content and mention you can only be boosted into ads if you have a public account that allows mentions. These stories may be visible for more than 24 hours and can be seen by anyone.

Block comments from.subtitle: Any new comments from people you block won't be visible to anyone but them.

options: People you follow and your followers

Allow GIF comments.subtitle: People will be able to comment GIFs on your posts and reels.

Notes on posts and reels.subtitle: When this is on, people can add notes to your posts and reels. You may not see some notes based on the audience.

Reels.subtitle: When these are on, anyone can create with all or part of your posts and reels in remixes, sequences, templates or stickers and download your content as part of their post or reel. They can also save and use any stickers you shared in a reel or story. You can turn off reuse for individual posts or reels from the more menu. You can't turn off reuse of original audio, text or comments. Learn more

Downloads.subtitle: When this is on, anyone can download your public reels, original audio from your reels and remixes by others. You can turn off downloading for individual reels from the more menu. Learn more

Website embeds.subtitle: When this is on, your public posts or profile can be shown outside of Instagram, including articles and blogs. Learn more

Featured content requests in shops.subtitle: When this is on, business accounts can request to feature your photos and videos in their shops across Meta Company Products when you tag accounts with shops or use hashtags related to shops in your posts. Learn more

Manage featured content.subtitle: Respond to open requests and manage your featured content.

Hide comments 1.subtitle: Comments that are potentially offensive, misleading or spam will be moved to a separate section. Anyone can see these comments, and you can unhide comments on your own posts at anytime. Learn more

Advanced comment filtering.subtitle: Even more comments that meet our criteria will automatically be hidden.

Hide message requests 1.subtitle: Message requests that may be offensive, spam or scams will be moved to the Hidden requests folder. We'll also filter notifications for these messages. This feature is not currently supported on web or Meta Quest.

Hide comments 2.subtitle: Comments that contain words, phrases or emojis on your custom list and similar misspellings will be filtered out so they are only visible to the authors.

Hide message requests 2.subtitle: Message requests that contain words from your list will be hidden. This feature is not currently supported on web or Meta Quest.

Flag for review.subtitle: Followers and follow requests from certain accounts, including potential spam, will be flagged and moved to a separate section of your Followers list. Learn more

Choose how much sensitive content to see.subtitle: This affects search results as well as recommended content in Explore, Reels, feed and hastag pages. This also affects comments you see on other people's posts.

Snooze suggested posts in feed.subtitle: Hide suggested posts in feed for 30 days

Hide like & share counts.subtitle: On Instagram, the number of likes on posts and reels from other accounts will be hidden. You can hide the number of likes on your own posts and reels by going to Advanced settings before sharing. On Threads, the number of likes, views, reposts and quotes on posts from other profiles will be hidden. You can hide these on your own posts from the menu for each post. Learn more

Save story to archive.subtitle: Automatically save photos and videos to your archive so you don't have to save them to your phone. Only you can see your archive.

Save live to archive.subtitle: Automatically save your live video to your archive. Only you can see your archive. Live videos are archived for 30 days.

Save original photos.subtitle: Automatically save the unedited photos and videos taken with Instagram's feed camera to your camera roll.

Save story to Camera Roll.subtitle: Automatically save photos and videos to your phone's camera roll.

Don't translate.subtitle: Choose languages you prefer to keep untranslated.

Translate stickers and text.subtitle: See stickers and text in your default language when available.

Use less cellular data.subtitle: Using less cellular data may affect your experience on Instagram. For exaple, photos and videos may take longer to load.

Upload at highest quality.subtitle: Always upload the highest quality photos and videos, even if uploading takes longer. When this is off, we'll automatically adjust upload quality to fit network conditions.

Disable HDR Video Playback.subtitle: HDR (high dynamic range) video offers greater quality in areas of extreme brightness or darkness. As a result, HDR content will appear brighter than standard content.

Open in external browser.subtitle: Links shared in messages will open externally.

Set up branded content tools.subtitle: Set up branded content tools to start using the paid partnership label.
